_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Maven repository - Reposilite
author: funixgaming7@gmail.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# SonarQube Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

echo -e "installing dependencies"
apt-get -y update
apt-get install -y wget

## add user
echo -e "adding container user"
useradd -d /home/container -m container -s /bin/bash

## own server to container user
chown container: /mnt/server/

cd /mnt/server

wget https://maven.reposilite.com/releases/com/reposilite/reposilite/${APP_VERSION}/reposilite-${APP_VERSION}-all.jar
mv reposilite-*.jar reposilite.jar
